Body:
I have the following code which calls updateThing from IoT class in aws-sdk JavaScript SDK. However it throws an error:

'{errorMessage":"1 validation error detected: Value \'{asd={\\"asd\\":\\"asd\\"}
column9: foo={\\"foo\\":\\"foo\\"}}\' at \'attributePayload.attributes\' failed to satisfy constraint: Map value must satisfy constraint: [Member must have length less than or equal to 800
column10: Member must have length greater than or equal to 0
column11: Member must satisfy regular expression pattern: [a-zA-Z0-9_.
column13:
This is within a Lambda function:

  const aws = require('aws-sdk');		  const IoT = new aws.Iot({	    endpoint: 'iot.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com'
column16: attributePayload: {	      attributes: {	        // should be the correct way of passing the object. expects a string value for each key	       'asd': JSON.stringify({asd:'asd'})
